message: Not us; another one - we really should attend. http://news.cnet.com/8301-17938_105-20078141-1/robots-take-the-big-screen-in-nyc-next-week/

That looks like it would be fun!  However, I think I'm too busy at this point to attend something that recreational for that cost plus subway / LIRR fair.  If you do get to go, have fun and tell all about it next time we meet.
